ratings.comment: Professor Wang is very patient and know what he is talking about! He truely cares about his students. If you don't understand class materials, just shows up to his office hour! He will explain everything and make sure that you understand!

Very slow at going through class material. First 2/3 of class was way too easy, and I feel like I learned nothing as a result of the class setup. The last 1/3 of the class was gone through way too quickly, and again I felt like I didnt learn anything as a result. Would do whatever I could to avoid having this professor again.
Very nice and patient professor. Explain materials clearly and slowly. Not a tough grader.

Went through the material way too slowly. We were unable to cover all of the course material. Decent at presenting the material, though. Tests were usually not too difficult if you understood the homework.
